markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Disliked](/Rules.aspx?ID=1242)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 165</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The PCs have a poor reputation among members of this group. Many members of the group know about the PCs, and are usually unfriendly to them. At this reputation, only moderate and major disservices reduce Reputation Points.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Disliked
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
